title: Couple With Heart Person Man Medium Dark Skin Tone Dark Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: person and man holding heart medium-dark skin tone dark skin tone
description: Represents a romantic couple, specifically a person with medium-dark skin tone and a man with dark skin tone, connected by a heart. It signifies love, affection, and partnership.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the couple with a heart, featuring a man with medium-dark skin tone and a man with dark skin tone, is depicted with warm, embracing figures and a central, glowing heart. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading enhances their forms and the translucent quality of the heart, symbolizing deep connection and love. This emoji on Apple devices beautifully represents romantic relationships, partnership, and heartfelt affection between two men.
